attributes.action: allow a commons debate & vote regarding the banning of incandescent light bulbs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The removal by regulation of incandescent light bulbs is a matter that will affect every room of every house in the Country.  This matter was stitched up by the Government in Brussels, and our elected Parliament has had no say over it whatsoever. Whether you are in favour or against the new bulbs is immaterial; surely we must all agree that our democracy is being traduced.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister has not prevented a debate on this matter.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
